title: Lowered the prices on all T cards
author: Leon

posts.post_title: Lowered the prices on all T cards
posts.post_content:
I just lowered the prices on all of the T cards on my site. Some might even be priced right now? I added some cards in other sections too...regards
 
[url]http://www.luckeycards.com/[/url]

Leon, you have a beautiful collection of cards and cigarette packs. What would the Hindu pack be worth? also the T-206 Young with hindu back? I need a T-206 Hindu back for my collection. I would also like to find a Hindu pack.  Thanks for showing your collection.   Marc

Thanks for the kind words. My Hindu Pack is dated 1908 so is a year before the cards would have come in it. I don't know what it's worth exactly but I would guess about $200, as it is still very rare.  The Hindu Young I picked up from a board member about a year or so ago. I always wanted a Young Portrait and the back just added to the flavor.....it's one of my favorite T206's.....take care
Leon email me details for the Helm SL'er card. Thanks D. [url]broughman@comcast.net[/url]
